rows.label: bf05110100_0010
rows.name: There's more than what was reported.

rows.label: bf05110100_0020
rows.name:
We've replaced the drive system 
with our country's technology.

rows.label: bf05110100_0030
rows.name: Since all the control systems have been dynamically preserved,

rows.label: bf05110100_0040
rows.name: we should be able to finish relatively soon.

rows.label: bf05110100_0050
rows.name:
Finally, we will be able to compensate for our forces'
depletion. The Gula struggle takes its toll.

rows.label: bf05110100_0052
rows.name: Sir.

rows.label: bf05110100_0054
rows.name: And there are no safety concerns, I trust?

rows.label: bf05110100_0056
rows.name:
The explosion accident from 3 months ago[ML:Dash ] 
We can't have that happen again, can we?

rows.label: bf05110100_0058
rows.name:
We've injected stabilizer into the Divine Beast's bodily fluids,
so there will be no impediment to normal operation.

rows.label: bf05110100_0060
rows.name:
Additionally, the rear portion 
is covered with special steel.

rows.label: bf05110100_0062
rows.name:
It can withstand direct enemy fire 
for an extended period.

rows.label: bf05110100_0064
rows.name:
Even if it were to be blown up...
Well, it'll be in enemy territory.

rows.label: bf05110100_0066
rows.name: Mutual destruction[ML:Dash ] huh?

rows.label: bf05110100_0068
rows.name: Well, the crew will have escape pods.

rows.label: bf05110100_0070
rows.name: Escape pods? Are you sure you don't mean coffins?

rows.label: bf05110100_0072
rows.name: I mean...

rows.label: bf05110100_0074
rows.name: Hmph...

rows.label: bf05110100_0076
rows.name:
Judicium, the dead nation that
realized Man-Eater technology...

rows.label: bf05110100_0078
rows.name:
I cannot say I find their
creations tasteful.

rows.label: bf05110100_0080
rows.name:
Your Excellency's aversion to
Man-Eaters, which combine human cells with Blades,

rows.label: bf05110100_0090
rows.name: is something I'm aware of.

rows.label: bf05110100_0100
rows.name: That's not it[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: bf05110100_0110
rows.name: I'm sorry, sir? Then what exactly do you...?

rows.label: bf05110100_0120
rows.name:
They say Man-Eaters were created
with the purpose of producing stronger Blades.

rows.label: bf05110100_0130
rows.name: Was that really the case?

rows.label: bf05110100_0140
rows.name:
To me, this technology seems like
the struggle of people trying to survive.

rows.label: bf05110100_0150
rows.name:
I look at them and see ourselves.
That is what I despise.

rows.label: bf05110100_0160
rows.name:
I will leave for Acedia shortly.
Much remains to be done.
